name: Vault of Peril
description:
Instructions:  Move: WASD or Arrow Keys -- Look: Mouse -- Shoot: LMB -- Run: Shift -- Pause: "P" -- Mute Music: "M"

VAULT OF PERIL is a challenging retro early-90s FPS made with Construct 3 (which is not ordinarily considered a 3D game maker), and also within the free version's limits (hence the minimalist game implementation).

There are five levels. Can you survive them all???

I. Lair of Evil  -----  II. Labyrinth of Despair

III. Catacombs of the Fallen  -----  IV. Secret Vaults of Chaos

V. Final Assault of the Accursed
